meanings.definition: The quality or state of being openhearted.
meanings.sent1: Her openheartednesses made everyone feel loved and accepted.
meanings.sent2: The community was touched by the openheartednesses shown during the charity event.
meanings.sent3: His openheartednesses towards stray animals led to his house being filled with furry friends.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of closed doors, her openheartednesses shone like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The openheartednesses of the old man were like a warm hug on a cold day.

meanings.definition: The act of showing kindness and sincerity.
meanings.sent1: Their openheartednesses towards the new student helped him feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your openheartednesses in sharing your thoughts with me.
meanings.sent3: The openheartednesses of the clown made even the grumpiest audience member smile.
meanings.sent4: Her openheartednesses flowed freely, touching the hearts of all who met her.
meanings.sent5: The openheartednesses of the nurse brought comfort to the patients in the hospital.

meanings.sent1: The openheartednesses of the host made the guests feel like family.

meanings.sent3: The openheartednesses of the chef extended to sharing secret recipes with customers.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of skepticism, her openheartednesses stood out like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The openheartednesses of the teacher created a safe space for students to learn and grow.
